attributes.name: [Elastic Agent] Open file descriptors approaching limit

esqlQuery.esql:
TS metrics-* 
| WHERE process.executable LIKE "*elastic*agent*"
| STATS open_fds = MAX(system.process.fd.open), soft_limit_fds = MAX(system.process.fd.limit.soft) BY elastic_agent.id, process.name
| EVAL pct_open_fds = (open_fds / soft_limit_fds) * 100
| WHERE pct_open_fds > 80
